title: The 8 Best Patagonia Deals From REI's Crazy-Good Outlet Sale
text:
Sweater weather is officially here, which means now's a better time to stock up on some extra layers. If you're looking to save on your new stock of fall essentials, you're in luck: REI has some great discounts on Patagonia fleeces, vests, flannels, and much more.

Patagonia is one of the most in-demand outdoor brands around—and for good reason. Not only does the brand make comfortable and stylish clothing, but Patagonia also puts sustainability and ethical awareness at the forefront. Translation? Whenever you put on one of Patagonia's popular pieces, you'll look good, feel good, and do some good for Mother Nature herself.

Whether you're stocking up on your favorite staples, or just want to see what all the hype of Patagonia's Synchilla fleece is about, check out the 8 best men's deals from this killer REI sale.
